title: The Switch
resume: Just as the responsibility of a teacher, has resolved resentment Gypsy identity Ha Linh should gradually be exposed. Enemies seek to take advantage of school and the pupils used as bait to force Ha Linh must appear. One side is the safety for themselves, one side of student life, Ha Linh forced to choose - to sacrifice himself or neglect students?
